app.title: AI Song Maker: Soniva Music
app.description:
Discover the future of music with AI Song Maker - Soniva. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, our app makes it easy to generate a professional song in seconds.

Why Soniva - AI Song Maker?
Instant AI Music Generator: Describe your desired vibe, and our AI generates a complete song with lyrics, realistic instruments, and authentic vocals.

Music for Everyone: AI Song Maker & AI Music Generator simplifies music creation, making it enjoyable and engaging, while building a community of passionate and innovative creators.

Dive into Musical Exploration: Our app's deep knowledge of musical styles lets you mix and match genres in exciting and innovative ways. Create unique, royalty-free songs ready to use anywhere.

Key Features:
Realistic Sound: AI generates high-quality songs, complete with authentic vocals, instruments, and lyrics based on your descriptions.

Share Your Music: Easily share your music creations on social media or with friends.

User-Friendly Interface: Experience the joy of music creation with our intuitive design that makes the process enjoyable and seamless.

Unlock your Musical Potential and download Soniva AI Song & AI Music Generator to create music whenever inspiration strikes. Your musical journey begins here.

Privacy Policy: https://sonivamusic.com/privacy_policy
Terms & Conditions: https://sonivamusic.com/terms_and_conditions

app.summary: Make songs with AI! Any genre, custom lyric, song generator for music creation!

reviews.text: Phenomenal. Amazing. I was not expecting my poem to turn into the beautiful song it became. I cried my eyes out because the emotion was where it was supposed to be. The female vocalist sang it so beautifully. The pauses and areas that needed to be loud or soft were perfect. You get two songs each time you create. The app gives you three creations free. Afterwards, it costs $5.99 a week for 20 songs. Not bad. Only one thing wrong, there needs to be an edit for lyrics after the song is created.

The developers fixed a major issue super fast and even gave back the credits I lost from it. Now that the issue is resolved, this app is incredible. The songs come out amazing with great lyrics and the vocals sound flawless. I genuinely love every song it's made so far. It's a shame that each input uses two credits, but I do like having two versions of the same song to choose from. I tried several AI song making apps before finding this one, and it's the best by far.

I definitely appreciate the opportunity to test out what this app is capable of doing with NO requirement to have an account with a "free trial period" like similar apps. Well, I created a total of 4 songs and when I listened to them, I was astounded! The quality of the lyrics, the vocals, the arrangements and the instrumentation is incredible! I will definitely be subscribing, knowing that the price is well worth the quality of the end product. Well done and congratulations to the developers.

honestly. amazing, just downloaded. I love writing songs, but can't play instruments that well. had an exact idea of what I wanted it to sound like. where I wanted the beat to kick in everything. wich parts to whisper or put in background. it was like it took it out of my head and made it. omg thank you. how have I never used this before. hope the next few songs I make are as good and that it wasn't a one off or fluke.

Absolutely astonishing! The moment I downloaded this I knew it would be the best! I just hate the fact that it has to be a FREE trial base and that should really go away with the subscription (Some people can't do that) But my 4 songs were amazing the moment I heard them. Well done creators but please let it be free with no subscriptions. Also, the fact that it's the right tune, it's really adoring. I also feel like you don't really need a maximum of words because that's a bit hard for people!

This is how its done. The BEST way! I wish i could send everyone a subscription to this because all the other apps that claim to "create" make horrible music., and those apps are teaching new music minded people that horrible is good, and thats sad. If you can think up a short story, write it here then HEAR IT HERE!!

It was worth it on paying for this app making songs for my movie and it was good but the problem is that this app doesn't finish the song for the female lead that she was supposed to sing. It doesn't finish the bridge on my first attempt and I fixed the lyrics again by adding a 4th verse. It doesn't fix the problem that it still added some of the parts of the chorus and it was almost perfect. I was going to give this 5 stars after a week after using it.

Honestly, i love the app, except the only problem i have with the app is that you only get to make 2 songs for free and then you have to upgrade which means subscription which means paying with money to make more songs, and also the songs arnt really in a tune i am looking for the lyrics are good but the tune dosnt really go with the lyrics. Over all i definently recommend this app.

So fun!!! I have only used the part where you enter your own lyrics. Be careful not to get addicted lol. I love the creative freedom and choices this app has. Worth the money for me. I really enjoy listening to the music. Such a good way to self express, especially if you're not that talented to make your own songs like me

The app was good at first but now it's giving invalid error messages. It mentioned there was racism detected when there was not and mentioned child exploitation, when there was no mention of any child. App doesn't work and is not accurate and rejects all the songs I try now. smh. it was good for about 2 weeks. now everything gives an error message
reviews.replyText: We're sorry for the inconvenience! Our system is designed to flag sensitive content, but false positives can happen. Please contact us directly in the app (Settings > Contact) so we can check your inputs and help resolve this.

app.AIReview:
AI Song Maker: Soniva Music - A Comprehensive Review

Overview

AI Song Maker: Soniva Music is an ambitious entry into the burgeoning field of AI-powered music generation. With over 316,000 installs and a solid 4.7-star rating from 16,290 users, it’s clear that this app has captured the attention of many who are interested in exploring simplified music creation tools. The core premise – generating professional-sounding songs based on user descriptions – is undeniably appealing, particularly to those lacking formal musical training or extensive equipment. Soniva positions itself as a solution for both beginners and experienced musicians looking for rapid prototyping and inspiration. The app’s free price point further contributes to its accessibility, making it a low-risk option to explore the possibilities of AI in music production.

Key Features

The app's functionality centers around several key features designed to streamline the song creation process:

  • AI Song Generator: This is the heart of Soniva. Users input a description of their desired musical style, mood, and even lyrical themes. The AI then generates an entire song – including instrumental tracks, vocals (synthesized), and lyrics – based on this prompt.
  • Genre Selection: While the AI can generate across many genres, users are presented with a list of options to guide the initial generation process. These include Pop, Hip-Hop, Electronic, Rock, R&B, Country, and more.
  • Lyric Customization: Users aren’t simply stuck with AI-generated lyrics. The app allows for editing and refinement of the generated text, offering a degree of control over the lyrical content.
  • Instrument Control (Limited): Within the generated song, users have some level of control over individual instrument volumes, though this is primarily a volume adjustment rather than a full mixing or mastering experience.
  • Community Features: Soniva integrates a community aspect, aiming to foster connections among users and potentially inspire new ideas through shared creations. (Details on the community functionality are somewhat sparse within the app itself).
  • Export Options: The generated song can be exported in MP3 format for easy sharing or use elsewhere.

Strengths

Several aspects of Soniva contribute to its popularity:

  • Ease of Use: The core concept – describing your desired music and receiving a full song – is remarkably intuitive. The app’s interface is clean and uncluttered, minimizing the learning curve.
  • Speed of Generation: Generating a complete song takes only seconds, drastically reducing the time commitment required compared to traditional music production methods. This rapid prototyping capability is a significant advantage.
  • Accessibility: Being free makes Soniva incredibly accessible to anyone curious about AI music generation. Removing financial barriers encourages experimentation and exploration.
  • Creative Spark: The app can genuinely serve as a useful tool for overcoming writer's block or generating initial song ideas, offering a starting point that users can then develop further.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Soniva has several areas ripe for improvement:

  • Song Quality Variability: The quality of the generated songs varies significantly. While some outputs are surprisingly good and polished, others are noticeably robotic or lack coherence, particularly in terms of musical structure and transitions.
  • Limited Instrumental Control: The current level of instrument control is extremely basic. More granular mixing options (EQ, compression, reverb) would greatly enhance the user’s ability to refine their creations.
  • Lyrical Consistency: While lyrical customization exists, the AI's initial lyric generation often suffers from repetition or a lack of thematic consistency.
  • Community Features – Unfulfilled Potential: The community aspect feels underdeveloped. There's no obvious way to share creations directly within the app, limiting its potential for collaboration and inspiration.
  • Lack of Export Formats: MP3 export is currently the only option. Offering WAV or other formats would broaden usability.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive, particularly considering the app’s free status and core functionality. The interface is well-organized, making it easy to navigate between the song generation feature, lyric editing, and instrument controls. However, the lack of tutorials or guidance on crafting effective prompts can be frustrating for new users. The responsiveness of the AI generator could also benefit from optimization – generating a full song sometimes takes slightly longer than expected, especially with more complex prompts. Visual feedback during the generation process would be valuable.

Value for Money

As a free app, Soniva offers incredible value. The core functionality—the AI song generator—is completely free to use, allowing users to experiment extensively without any financial commitment. While premium features or subscriptions are hinted at within the app's UI (suggesting potential future monetization), the current offering represents exceptional value for anyone interested in exploring this technology.

Conclusion

AI Song Maker: Soniva Music is a promising and surprisingly effective tool for generating music using artificial intelligence. Its intuitive interface, rapid song generation speed, and free price point make it an excellent entry point into the world of AI-powered music creation. While inconsistencies in song quality and limitations in instrument control currently hold it back from being a truly polished product, the app’s core concept is strong and holds significant potential for future development. Soniva isn't going to replace professional musicians anytime soon, but it is a fantastic tool for hobbyists, songwriters seeking inspiration, or anyone curious about exploring the intersection of AI and music. We rate it 4.2/5 – a solid recommendation with room for improvement.
